characterList: 讚貳膩洩划嘎域栽戚蔑喊

characters.story: "Dzahn!" Words with two shellfish commanded sharply - praise, compliments and likes!
II two shellfish commands sharply "Urr!" - number two formal!
Like a body, this character means sick and tired of and shouts "Nee!"!
Like water, this character means discharge and shouts "Shyeh!"!
With a knife combined with a stroke, you get paddle - "Hwah? Row?" rings out curiously!
The mouth takes the shape of caw, asking "Gah? What doing?" curiously!
Like soil, this character means domain and shouts "Yoo!" - a vivid image to remember!
The strokes unite to show sow, singing "Dzigh!" cheerfully - a vivid image to remember!
Picture kin taking form - it sings "Chee!" with vivid energy!
The strokes unite to show despise, shouting "Myeh!" sharply!
The mouth stands for yell, shouting "Hahn" sharply spoken through parted lips!
